title: Open Interest Analysis
description: By tracking open interest alongside price changes, you can gauge whether a trend is gaining or losing momentum, leading to more informed trading decisions.

title: Heat Map Visualisation
description: Our heat map offers a vivid, intuitive snapshot of market activity. By presenting price movements across different cryptocurrencies in a color-coded format, you can instantly identify hotspots of high activity and areas of relative calm.

title: Liquidation Map
description: Stay ahead with our real-time liquidation map, a crucial asset for understanding market movements. This feature provides a comprehensive view of where liquidations are occurring, offering clues about support and resistance levels.
